title: The Bridge

description: Danny Craven lives in Launching Place, a quiet town that is relatively isolated from the rest of the community. One day when Danny is buying groceries for her dysfunctional family, she watches the cars go by on the highway, wishing that one of them can transport her away. She meets Gary, a young man to whom she is instantly attracted and in one night discovers love and horror under the bridge.
